name: Withering Corrosion
description:
Start with 4 Candle of Life points.
When your character uses a Skill: Remove 1 Candle of Life point.
Once all Candle of Life points are depleted, the opposing duelist loses the match.
descriptionraw: Start with 4 Candle of Life points.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When your character uses a Skill:</color> Remove 1 Candle of Life point.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Once all Candle of Life points are depleted, the opposing duelist loses the match.</color>
